snippet.title: Polychoron alpha gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Polychoron is a simple but challenging zero-gravity 3D high score shoot'em up in endless series of unique mazes. Designed for hassle-free short game sessions. It's currently in development with alpha builds available on Windows, Linux, Android and web.

https://www.fractilegames.com/polychoron

Visit the game page for free downloads or play the game in your browser. Let me know what you think!
